Plot: Abortionist Vera Drake finds her beliefs and practices clash with the mores of 1950s Britain--a conflict that leads to tragedy for her family.
Title: Vera Drake
Actors: Imelda Staunton, Richard Graham, Eddie Marsan, Anna Keaveney
tomatoConsensus: With a piercingly powerful performance by Imelda Staunton, Vera Drake brings teeming humanity to the controversial subject of abortion.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 40 wins & 37 nominations.
